attributes.action: Stop any proposal to use more Lottery funds to meet the costs of the Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was the Government who supported and encouraged the bid for the Games. They should therefore be funded out of general taxation, and not from the Lottery which amounts to a tax on the poorest people. Lottery funds should not be available to the Government

rejection.details: There are already several petitions on this issue. Please consider signing one of those, rather than creating another. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
